MacChangeLog=Beta update<br><br>Advanced sound notifications (in rules).<br>Trailing stop.<br>Now you can create fully authomated strategies using % values.<br>Now you can Enable/Disable rule groups by another group rule.<br>Night Mode.<br>Added Czech, Italiano, Turkish languages.<br>Added filter to open order.<br>Added percentage picker for balances.<br>A lot of core and ui fixes.<br>Fixed critical bug when packet can be lost.<br>Added value picker by mouse.<br>Added traffic and speed indicators.<br>Fixed bug with zero profit step calculations.<br>Fixed "All In" bugs.<br>Fixed application dir in Mac OS X
